name: Sphere of Prophet
description: This morion sphere seals the secrets of the past and the future. Do you dare to pay the price to see them?
effect: Your Hero can make the following action when they are within 2 spaces of a sealed portal:

abilities.name: Scry
abilities.description:
Pick a sealed portal within 2 spaces and sacrifice 1 point of both personal and group Renown. The gamemaster then tells you the number and size of adversaries in the next chamber.
__The answer could be approximated.__
